languages.text: "У нас, считай, нога под землями пылала. Я сам видел, как люди с ума сходят — вдруг падали на колени и начинали глаза себе вырывать..."

traits.locale_text: "У нас, считай, нога под землями пылала. Я сам видел, как люди с ума сходят — вдруг падали на колени и начинали глаза себе вырывать..."

languages.text: "The ground was pretty much burning beneath our feet. I saw people who were losing their minds — just dropping to their knees and tearing their eyes out..."
languages.original_text: "У нас, считай, нога под землями пылала. Я сам видел, как люди с ума сходят — вдруг падали на колени и начинали глаза себе вырывать..."

traits.locale_text: "The ground was pretty much burning beneath our feet. I saw people who were losing their minds — just dropping to their knees and tearing their eyes out..."
"The ground was pretty much burning beneath our feet. I saw people who were losing their minds — just dropping to their knees and tearing their eyes out..."
"The ground was pretty much burning beneath our feet. I saw people who were losing their minds — just dropping to their knees and tearing their eyes out..."
"The ground was pretty much burning beneath our feet. I saw people who were losing their minds — just dropping to their knees and tearing their eyes out..."
"The ground was pretty much burning beneath our feet. I saw people who were losing their minds — just dropping to their knees and tearing their eyes out..."
"The ground was pretty much burning beneath our feet. I saw people who were losing their minds — just dropping to their knees and tearing their eyes out..."

languages.text: 「足下の地表は大部分が燃えてた。正気を失っちまった連中もいたよ―膝をついて大泣きしていたな…」
languages.original_text: "The ground was pretty much burning beneath our feet. I saw people who were losing their minds — just dropping to their knees and tearing their eyes out..."

traits.locale_text: 「足下の地表は大部分が燃えてた。正気を失っちまった連中もいたよ―膝をついて大泣きしていたな…」

languages.text: « Le sol brûlait presque littéralement sous nos pieds. J'ai vu des gens qui sombraient dans la folie... Ils tombaient à genoux en s'arrachant les yeux... »
languages.original_text: "The ground was pretty much burning beneath our feet. I saw people who were losing their minds — just dropping to their knees and tearing their eyes out..."

traits.locale_text: « Le sol brûlait presque littéralement sous nos pieds. J'ai vu des gens qui sombraient dans la folie... Ils tombaient à genoux en s'arrachant les yeux... »

languages.text: “我们脚下的土地真的是快要烧起来了。我看到有人发了疯，他们跪在地上，把自己的眼睛挖了出来……”
languages.original_text: "The ground was pretty much burning beneath our feet. I saw people who were losing their minds — just dropping to their knees and tearing their eyes out..."

traits.locale_text: “我们脚下的土地真的是快要烧起来了。我看到有人发了疯，他们跪在地上，把自己的眼睛挖了出来……”

languages.text: "Der Boden unter unseren Füßen hat praktisch gebrannt. Leute haben den Verstand verloren – sie sind auf die Knie gefallen und haben sich die Augen rausgerissen ..."
languages.original_text: "The ground was pretty much burning beneath our feet. I saw people who were losing their minds — just dropping to their knees and tearing their eyes out..."

traits.locale_text: "Der Boden unter unseren Füßen hat praktisch gebrannt. Leute haben den Verstand verloren – sie sind auf die Knie gefallen und haben sich die Augen rausgerissen ..."

languages.text: «El suelo sobre el que esperamos estaba ardiendo. A la gente se le empezó a ir la cabeza; algunos se empezaron a caer de rodillas y a arrancarse los ojos...».
languages.original_text: "The ground was pretty much burning beneath our feet. I saw people who were losing their minds — just dropping to their knees and tearing their eyes out..."

traits.locale_text: «El suelo sobre el que esperamos estaba ardiendo. A la gente se le empezó a ir la cabeza; algunos se empezaron a caer de rodillas y a arrancarse los ojos...».

languages.text: "Yeryüzü ayaklarımızın altında resmen yanıyordu. Aklını kaybeden insanlar gördüm. Dizlerinin üstüne çöküp kendi gözlerini oyuyorlardı."
languages.original_text: "The ground was pretty much burning beneath our feet. I saw people who were losing their minds — just dropping to their knees and tearing their eyes out..."

traits.locale_text: "Yeryüzü ayaklarımızın altında resmen yanıyordu. Aklını kaybeden insanlar gördüm. Dizlerinin üstüne çöküp gözlerini oyuyorlardı."
